attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sort out the tax credit system. Its far too complex. I am constantly lied to when I phone the office, letters are not worth the paper they are written on, far too many mistakes are made by this departmant & we are just expected to sit back & let it happen. Far too many delays in getting money we are entitled to.I am being punished for WORKING.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
